com.github.davidmoten.rx.subjects

Class PublishSubjectSingleSubscriber<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • rx.Observable<R>
      • rx.subjects.Subject<T,T>
        • com.github.davidmoten.rx.subjects.PublishSubjectSingleSubscriber<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - type of items being emitted/observed by this subject
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    rx.Observer<T>

    public final class PublishSubjectSingleSubscriber<T>
extends rx.subjects.Subject<T,T>
    A Subject that supports a maximum of one Subscriber. When there is no subscriber any notifications (onNext, onError, onCompleted) are ignored.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class rx.Observable
